Name: Unforgettable Nightmare
Desc:
Scratches the enemy with the power of the specter in your hand. Enhances to Unforgettable Ominous Dream in Spectral Form.
Lv. 20 Effect: Can learn the 3rd skill, Reviving Nightmare

H.Old:
HP Cost: 30. Attacks up to 6 enemies at 90% damage 6 times.
Cooldown: 2 sec
